channel.title: Suggestions for streaming?
channel.description: I’ve considered to start streaming Throne of Lies for the past few weeks, and i think I require some tips to start streaming with at least decent quality, any tips anyone can’t provide?

item.title: Suggestions for streaming?
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
I stream aswell
My tips:
Try to keep the game running 20fps or higher if you can’t that’s fine, but if you can I’d push for the highest settings without breaking you computer.
Interact with viewers it’s very nice to talk to them about things not only doesn’t it help them know you more but you get to know the people behind your streams looking up to you.
Be talkative, don’t Force it but try your best and talk about things related but sometimes off topic.
Not much but be yourself if you act fake people can tell.

Hope it helps I’m a noon at streaming

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for streaming?
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
I watch poker streams regularly, they just chuck a 5 minute delay on their stream, you can post links to hosted TOL in chat and you’re good to go! I suppose it comes down to what you’re willing to give up to avoid stream sniping but I think people are pretty good.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for streaming?
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Ehh it’s tough steaming. I wouldn’t recommend it imo I would go the videos route, but yes if you have to stream then never play with your fans because they will stream snipe you. But for quality purposes you have to leave your stream uncovered or else the streams are low quality.

Read full topic
